WARNING_nonstandard_garbage_format_below: at least this is readable from a script unlike the pdf

realtime_datum_RO.name: real time battery voltage
realtime_datum_RO.description: undocumented in ControllerProtocolV2.3 table but mentioned in example

realtime_datum_RO.name: battery SOC
realtime_datum_RO.description: The percentage of battery's remaining capacity

realtime_datum_RO.name: remote battery temperature
realtime_datum_RO.description: The battery temperature measured by remote temperature sensor

realtime_status_RO.name: battery status
realtime_status_RO.description:
D3-D0: 01H Overvolt , 00H Normal ,
02H Under Volt, 03H Low Volt
Disconnect, 04H Fault
D7-D4: 00H Normal, 01H Over
Temp.(Higher than the warning
settings), 02H Low Temp.(Lower
than the warning settings),
D8: Battery inner resistance
abnormal 1,
normal 0
D15: 1-Wrong identification for rated
voltage

00F0h.1: over temp (higher than the warning setting E24)
00F0h.2: low temp (lower than the warning setting E25)

realtime_status_RO.name: charging equipment status
realtime_status_RO.description:
D15-D14: Input volt status. 00
normal, 01 no
power connected, 02H Higher volt
input, 03H
Input volt error.
D13: Charging MOSFET is short.
D12: Charging or Anti-reverse
MOSFET is short.
D11: Anti-reverse MOSFET is short.
D10: Input is over current.
D9: The load is Over current.
D8: The load is short.
D7: Load MOSFET is short.
D4: PV Input is short.
D3-2: Charging status. 00 No
charging,01 Float,02
Boost, 03 Equalization.
D1: 0 Normal, 1 Fault.
D0: 1 Running, 0 Standby.

1000h.1: charging or anti-reverse MOSFET is short.

realtime_status_RO.name: discharging equipment status
realtime_status_RO.description:
D15-D14: 00H normal, 01H low,
02H High, 03H no access
Input volt error.
D13-D12: output power:00-light
load,01-moderate,02-rated,03-overlo
ad
D11: short circuit
D10: unable to discharge
D9: unable to stop discharging
D8: output voltage abnormal
D7: input overpressure
D6: high voltage side short circuit
D5: boost overpressure
D4: output overpressure
D1: 0 Normal, 1 Fault.
D0: 1 Running, 0 Standby.

stats_RO.name: consumed energy this month
stats_RO.description: 00:00 clear on the first day of month

stats_RO.name: generated energy this month
stats_RO.description: 00:00 clear on first day of month

registers_RW.name: battery type
registers_RW.description: 1=sealed, 2=GEL, 3=flooded, 0=user defined

registers_RW.name: battery capacity
registers_RW.description: rated capacity of battery

registers_RW.name: temperature compensation coefficient
registers_RW.description: range 0-9

registers_RW.name: real time clock sec min
registers_RW.description:
D7-0 Sec, D15-8
Min.(Year, Month, Day, Min, Sec.
should be written simultaneously)

registers_RW.name: controller inner temperature upper limit recover
registers_RW.description: Over Temperature, system recover once it drop to lower than this value

registers_RW.name: day time threshold volt (DTTV)
registers_RW.description: PV lower than this value, controller would detect it as sundown

registers_RW.name: light signal startup (night) delay time
registers_RW.description: PV voltage lower than NTTV, and duration exceeds the Light signal startup (night) delay time, controller would detect it as night time

registers_RW.name: light time threshold volt (NTTV)
registers_RW.description: PV voltage higher than this value, controller would detect it as sunrise

registers_RW.name: light signal close (day) delay time
registers_RW.description: PV voltage higher than DTTV, and duration exceeds the Light signal close (day) delay time, controller would detect it as day time

registers_RW.name: load controlling modes
registers_RW.description: 0=manual, 1=light on/off, 2=light on+timer, 3=time control

registers_RW.name: Working time length 1
registers_RW.description: The length of load output timer1, D15-D8: hour , D7-D0: minute

registers_RW.name: Working time length 2
registers_RW.description: The length of load output timer2, D15-D8: hour , D7-D0: minute

registers_RW.name: Turn on timing 1
registers_RW.description: Turn on timing of load output

registers_RW.name: Turn off timing 1
registers_RW.description: Turn off timing of load output

registers_RW.name: Turn on timing 2
registers_RW.description: Turn on timing of load output

registers_RW.name: Turn off timing 2
registers_RW.description: Turn off timing of load output

registers_RW.name: backlight time
registers_RW.description: Close after LCD backlight light setting the number of seconds

registers_RW.name: Length of night
registers_RW.description: Set default values of the whole night length of time. D15-D8: hour, D7-D0: minute

registers_RW.name: Device configure of main power supply
registers_RW.description: 1=battery is main, 2= AC-DC power mainly

registers_RW.name: Default Load On/Off in manual mode
registers_RW.description: 0=off, 1=on

registers_RW.name: Equalize duration
registers_RW.description: Usually 0-120 minutes

registers_RW.name: Boost duration
registers_RW.description: Usually 10-120 minutes

registers_RW.name: discharging percentage
registers_RW.description: Usually 20%-80%. The percentage of battery's remaining capacity when stop charging

registers_RW.name: charging percentage
registers_RW.description: depth of charge, 100%

registers_RW.name: Management modes of battery charging and discharging
registers_RW.description: Management modes of battery charge and discharge, voltage compensation: 0 and SOC: 1

coils_RW.name: charging device on/off
coils_RW.description: 1 charging device on, 0 charging device off

coils_RW.name: output control mode manual/automatic
coils_RW.description: 1 output control mode manual, 0 output control mode automatic

coils_RW.name: Manual control the load
coils_RW.description: When the load is manual mode, 1=manual on, 0=manual off

coils_RW.name: Default control the load
coils_RW.description: When the load is default mode, 1=manual on, 0=manual off

coils_RW.name: force the load on/off
coils_RW.description: 1 turn on, 0 turn off (used for temporary test of the load)

discrete_inputs_RO.name: Over temperature inside the device
discrete_inputs_RO.description: 1 The temperature inside the controller is higher than the over-temperature protection point. 0 Normal
